tachyon.master.file.meta

Class MountTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.file.meta.MountTable

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class MountTable
extends Object
    This class is used for keeping track of Tachyon mount points.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ROOT 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MountTable()
      Creates a new instance of MountTable.

      boolean delete(TachyonURI uri)
      Unmounts the given Tachyon path.
      String getMountPoint(TachyonURI uri)
      Returns the mount point the given path is nested under.
      boolean isMountPoint(TachyonURI uri)
      Returns in indication of whether the given path is a mount point.

      Resolves the given Tachyon path.

    • Constructor Detail

        public MountTable()
        Creates a new instance of MountTable.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(TachyonURI tachyonUri,
                TachyonURI ufsUri)
         throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                InvalidPathException
        Mounts the given UFS path at the given Tachyon path. The Tachyon path should not be nested under an existing mount point.
        Parameters:
        tachyonUri - a Tachyon path URI
        ufsUri - a UFS path URI
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if the mount point already exists
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered

      • delete

        public boolean delete(TachyonURI uri)
        Unmounts the given Tachyon path. The path should match an existing mount point.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Tachyon path URI
        Returns:
        whether the operation succeeded or not

      • getMountPoint

        public String getMountPoint(TachyonURI uri)
                     throws InvalidPathException
        Returns the mount point the given path is nested under.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Tachyon path URI
        Returns:
        mount point the given Tachyon path is nested under
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered

      • isMountPoint

        public boolean isMountPoint(TachyonURI uri)
        Returns in indication of whether the given path is a mount point.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Tachyon path URI
        Returns:
        mount point the given Tachyon path is nested under

      • resolve

        public TachyonURI resolve(TachyonURI uri)
                   throws InvalidPathException
        Resolves the given Tachyon path. If the given Tachyon path is nested under a mount point, the resolution maps the Tachyon path to the corresponding UFS path. Otherwise, the resolution is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Tachyon path URI
        Returns:
        the resolved path
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered
